meanings.definition: Relating to or consisting of dactyls.
meanings.sent1: The dactylics rhythm in the poem was easy to follow.
meanings.sent2: Her dactylics writing style made the story flow smoothly.
meanings.sent3: The dactylics pattern in the song had everyone tapping their feet.
meanings.sent4: The dactylics beat of the music echoed through the hall.
meanings.sent5: The dactylics structure of the building resembled a wave.

meanings.definition: The rhythmic pattern of dactyls in poetry.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed the dactylics of the poem, it had a nice flow.
meanings.sent2: The dactylics in his writing added a musical quality to the verse.
meanings.sent3: The dactylics of the nursery rhyme made the children giggle.
